thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Romania's Banca Transilvania starts mandatory tender for 33.2 pct of Moldova's Victoriabank

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Romania's Banca Transilvania starts mandatory tender for 33.2 pct of Moldova's Victoriabank
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Romanian lender Banca Transilvania
* Says will start mandatory public tender offer for shares of minority stakeholders of Moldovaâ€™s Victoriabank.
* Says tender applies to remaining 8.3 million shares, or 33.2 percent of total ordinary nominative shares with voting rights.
* Says offered price is 78.21 MDL per share and the mandatory public tender offer is valid for 70 days, during Feb. 14 and April 24.
* Banca Transilvania acquired initial indirect stake of 39 percent last year in Victoriabank, the third largest bank in the Republic of Moldova. (Reporting by Luiza Ilie)
